list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: affected by physical or mental illness.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Điều dưỡng trẻ em rất ốm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: feeling nauseous and wanting to vomit.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was starting to feel sick
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã bắt đầu cảm thấy bị bệnh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: intensely annoyed with or bored by (someone or something) as a result of having had too much of them.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I'm absolutely sick of your moods
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi hoàn toàn phát ốm vì tâm trạng của bạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (especially of humor) having something unpleasant such as death, illness, or misfortune as its subject and dealing with it in an offensive way.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: this was someone's idea of a sick joke
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đây là ý tưởng của ai đó về một trò đùa bệnh hoạn
